prompt: Photorealistic wide shot of a large, framed J. Segura fiberglass wall panel depicting Roman soldiers and horses, displayed prominently on a minimalist white wall in a modern art auction preview room. Subtle gallery spotlights highlight the artwork's 3D texture and painted details. In the background, blurred figures of potential buyers observe from a distance, adding scale and context to the artwork's value. Clean, professional atmosphere, gallery setting. --ar 16:9
name: j-segura-fiberglass-art-value-image-1.png

prompt: Extreme close-up, macro photograph focusing on the intricate textured surface of a J. Segura fiberglass artwork, possibly showing the detailed musculature of a horse or the folds in a figure's cloak. Dramatic, low-angle raking light emphasizes the 3D relief, casting deep shadows and highlighting the fiberglass material and layers of vintage paint. Shallow depth of field, background completely blurred, focusing solely on the material and craftsmanship. Photorealistic detail. --ar 16:9
name: j-segura-fiberglass-art-value-image-2.png

prompt: Photorealistic image of a stylish mid-century modern living room interior. A J. Segura fiberglass art panel featuring stylized horses hangs centered above a long teak credenza that spans most of the lower width of the frame. Warm, natural light streams in from an unseen side window, illuminating the artwork's texture and casting soft shadows on the wall. Period-appropriate decor like a vintage lamp and ceramic vase sit on the credenza. Comfortable, inviting atmosphere, interior design photography style. --ar 16:9
name: j-segura-fiberglass-art-value-image-3.png

prompt: Photorealistic wide shot capturing an art conservator's well-lit workshop. A large J. Segura fiberglass panel lies flat horizontally across a wide workbench dominating the foreground. Gloved hands are carefully examining or cleaning a section with specialized tools (e.g., cotton swab, small brush). Bright, even overhead studio lighting reveals the artwork's condition, with conservation supplies and reference materials visible but tidy in the background shelves. Documentary style, focus on careful assessment and preservation. --ar 16:9
name: j-segura-fiberglass-art-value-image-4.png

prompt: Photorealistic panoramic view of a clean, expansive gallery wall displaying a curated collection of three different J. Segura fiberglass art pieces. The artworks vary in size and theme (e.g., medieval figures, abstract horses, Diana) and are arranged thoughtfully in a horizontal line across the wide 16:9 frame with ample negative space between them. Soft, even gallery lighting illuminates each piece uniformly, showcasing their 3D quality, distinct styles, and collective impact as valuable collectibles. Museum documentation style. --ar 16:9
name: j-segura-fiberglass-art-value-image-5.png
